title: The Journey: From Print to Online
abstract: Mitchell1, a division of Snap-on Tools, is a 95-year old company that provides automotive repair, diagnostic and estimating information to the automotive repair industry. Evolving from a print history to “computerized manuals” on CD then DVD and then to an online product, Mitchell1 (like others in this space) continues to be confronted with exponential growth of content due to the increased complexity of the modern vehicle. Making relevant information easily “find-able” by our customers is the key to success, and Mitchell1’s newest online product delivers that vision through the use of MarkLogic. This talk will discuss Mitchell1’s evolution from a “structured data” approach to moving to a document-centric approach in MarkLogic architecture.
